chapter.title: Introduction
chapter.para: GnomeSword is a Bible study and research tool based upon the "SWORD Project" libraries and the GNOME Desktop libraries. You can use GnomeSword to do the following:

listitem.para: Make sermon or personal notes on selected passages

chapter.para: GnomeSword aims to provide a simple and clean user interface whilst providing a powerful tool allowing a personalized Bible study environment.

warning.para: GnomeSword is currently in development, so this manual may not reflect the program as you see it. If it does not, please file a bug at the project website, or email gnomesword-developers@lists.sourceforge.net. All help is appreciated, as it will improve the software.
